column2: Convert to Shaktah
column3: Adopter l'hindouisme
column4: Konvertiert zum Hinduismus
column6: Convertir al Hinduismo

column2: The Hindu religions have so many traditions in common, and the people's beliefs are so mixed, that it is not impossible for a person to simply choose to convert from one of the religions to another. Such a choice may only be made once in a lifetime, however.
column3: Les religions indiennes possèdent tant de traditions communes, et les croyances sont si mélangées, qu'il n'est pas impossible pour quelqu'un de simplement choisir de se convertir à une autre des religions concernées. Cependant, on ne peut faire ce choix qu'une fois au cours d'une vie.
column4: Die indischen Religionen haben so viel gemein und die Glaubensvorstellungen vermischen sich so stark, dass es nicht unmöglich ist, einfach zwischen ihnen zu wechseln. Solch eine Wahl kann allerdings nur einmal im Leben getroffen werden.
column6: Las religiones indias tienen tantas tradiciones en común y las creencias están tan mezcladas, que no es imposible para alguien simplemente convertirse de una religión a otra. Aunque es una decisión que solo se puede tomar una vez en la vida.

column2: Is Hindu
Srauta Opinion
Start preparing a campaign against the heathens in France, to reconquer parts of the French Empire for Marianne. A large undertaking like this can usually only be done once a lifetime.
Find a fitting dynasty member to become a beneficiary for my reconquests in France.
Set §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! as a beneficiary for my reconquests in France.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! will no longer be my beneficiary for the Reconquest of France.
I can sell my services against the other Jacobins for a sum of money, if §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is willing to pay.
I can ask §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! for help against the other Jacobin invaders, in return for a small sum of money.
Jacobin Blood of [Root.GetFirstName]
Known for fighting against the heathens throughout the Jacobin Maquis Wars, one of the greatest generals of our times.
Maquisard Blood of [Root.GetFirstName]
Known for being one of the most important characters in the reconquests of the French kingdoms.
It seems I have waited too long, as my men and all my preparation starts to come apart. It seems people lost faith in my plans, when I did not start any wars for our rightful Marianne.

Magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

Your plans to reconquer France for our rightful Marianne inspires me to take up arms as well, and I will support your efforts to the best of my ability.

Your ally,
[From.GetTitledName]

After leading troops on both sides of the wars raging throughout France, I seem to have grown quite the reputation among the local peasants and soldiers on both sides.

Though some would consider me a mercenary or a traitor to the faith, my prowess in war has made me a hero among most, and revered among the populace. Some would even go as far as to call me a folk hero.

Surely, my actions must have been righteous, seeing all the responses. I have often wondered if it would all be worth it in the end, and it is a joyous occasion to see all my hard work has paid off.
The Jacobin Hero

I have fought for the faith several times these recent years, to recapture the kingdoms of France as a true vanguard for our rightful Marianne and her followers.

Though we were once defeated by the heathens, who had reasserted their ancient heathen beliefs in the chaos after the Event, we have once again brought them under the rule of Marianne. Step by step, we have regained what is rightfully ours.

The kingdoms of France will rise as a bastion of our rightful Marianne once more. We will make sure of it.

To the greedy [Root.GetTitledName]

Your despicable offer disgusts me. I hope to see you at the battlefield next, so I can cut you down together with the rest of the heathens.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

Your prowess in war is well known throughout France, and I would like to offer you a sum of gold for your services in the current Maquis War.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

There will probably be men showing up to fight for the faith in the upcoming wars for France, but I could invest some money into spreading the message far and wide to attract more well trained troops.

A year has passed since I started my preparations for the reconquest of France, and I am sure that whoever wanted to take part in the reconquest would have arrived by now. Now all that remains is to find a place to point my newfound allies towards.
The Jacobin Maquis Wars

As the last in a long line of attempts to try to reconquer the kingdoms of France, [From.GetTitledName] has begun preparing [From.GetHerHis] troops and looking for allies for a new Jacobin campaign. Trying to restore parts of France to Marianne, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has spent a noticeable amount of resources and sent out a call to gather troops from all around the region.\n\nWith the Jacobins planning for war, the other faiths have started assembling their troops to defend themselves. It is only a matter of months, or maybe a year, before the two sides will clash together once more, desperately trying to claw their way to more land in France.
France belongs to Marianne!
This French nonsense does not belong here!
End of the Maquis

Not even the most isolated heathen bastions have been safe from the Jacobin reconquest of Mexico. The final bastions of the other faiths in the region has fallen.\n\nWith France finally restored to the faithful, the reconquest of the empire has ended, and peace has been restored. Once more the center of the faith, the kingdoms of France will surely play an important role in the region.

A minor noble has launched a campaign to start gathering troops to reconquer parts of France. [From.GetTitledFirstName] asks for my help in supporting [From.GetHerHim], and taking part in the reconquest. This is a great opportunity to push back the heathens from the kingdoms of France.
